label: Sky chart
description: Theme defined closely to standard black and white sky charts, like the ones seen in printed catalogues.

label: Tiny
description: Does not accentuate objects, helper lines and labels are low contrasted. Just a calm an pleasant view of the sky.

label: Wikipedia
description: Theme resembling the one often used in Wikipedia for sky charts.

label: Night view
description: Dim and low contrast theme preserving the eyes from agressive light, that might be useful at night.
